stories.title: Tesla Wanted $22,500 to Replace a Battery. An Independent Shop Fixed It for $5k

stories.text:
I was looking at a listing, 100$ yearly (yes, yearly) revenue and the asking price is 50K. Another site has $20 revenue and the asking price is 8k. And so on.

Is this normal? I remember seeing multiples of 3 years profit. These listings look insane
stories.title: Ask HN: Whats with the insane valuation of websites these days?
About the security content of iOS 14.8 and iPadOS 14.8
Show HN: Tool to sanitize data from Java heap dumps

stories.text:
Hey Guys, Neeraj here - founder of Snackwyze (https://snackwyze.com), the easiest, fastest and the most affordable way to create, share and track clickthrough demos for your software.

Personally, I have been in Sales and marketing for over 10 years and worked at various companies /various sizes including Cisco. And in those many years, I never found an easy way to create clickthrough demos for sales and marketing use cases. So I decided to build a platform for the same. My buddy and I built a chrome extension that records your screen and converts every single click into a step-by-step clickhthrough demo that you can easily share, embed, download and then track from the Snackwyze platform.

I'd love for you guys to try it out and let me know if you find it useful. If you are looking to create product tours/deos for your website then I'd be delighted to help you build as well.

Thank you! Cheers
stories.title: Show HN: Snackwyze- Bite sized clickthrough demos instantly
